Question
========

A pure die is rolled 30 times. The binomial random variable *X* = the number of times the six is up. The probability of a "success" is then:________.

Answerlist
----------

* 1/30
* 1/24
* 5/6
* 1/6

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/30: Incorrect
* 1/24: Incorrect
* 5/6: Incorrect
* 1/6: Correct
